Hayu

Korean: 하유

Group (2019-present):

Introduction

Hayu is a South Korean singer under Liz Entertainment. She is a member of the project girl group Chic&I's and a former member of ICU. On August 28, 2022, it was announced that Hayu had graduated from ICU.
